channel.title: Janet Yang on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Korean Powerhouse CJ ENM Teams With Janet Yang, Miky Lee and Dominic Ng for Asian Storytelling Venture
item.description: The powerhouse trio will oversee a new label dedicated to authentic storytelling from the Asian diaspora, with plans to partner with major studios and streamers.
